General.Name: Vivotek Inc
General.Description: Vivotek Inc., together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacturing and sale of video compression software and encoding, network video servers, network cameras, and related components. It operates through OBM Business, ODM Business, and Vivotek USA segments. The company offers network cameras, including 180° panoramic, 360° fisheye, multi-sensor, fixed dome, bullet, thermal bullet, box, mobile dome, speed dome, split-type, and application cameras; AI boxes; video servers and receivers; NVR products; and facial recognition workstations, tablets, CMS devices, and cameras. It also provides CMS stations; analytics, such as parking violation detection, restricted zone detection, smart motion detection, smart tracking advanced, smart VCA, and VMS plug-in products; VMS software; and 3D software for building information management, smart management tools, design surveillance systems, mobile surveillance app, camera management tool, and validation tool. In addition, the company offers cloud services; PoE network products; and accessories comprising mounting kits, enclosures, covers, lens, power supply and boxes, cables, I/O devices, joysticks, cabinets, cabinet accessories, storage products, illuminators, connectors, and network audio devices. Further, the company invests in network communication industry; sells lighting equipment; and invests in and leases real estate properties. It operates in the United States, Taiwan, Canada, the Netherlands, and internationally through distributors. Vivotek Inc. was incorporated in 2000 and is headquartered in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 192, Lien-Cheng Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 23553
